title: Calamity Jane (Captioned)
creator_credit: David Butler, William Jacobs and Warner Bros Pictures
brief_description: The Wild West in a spectacular musical with Doris Day as Calamity Jane and Howard Keel as Wild Bill Hickcock. Calamity Jane arrives from the “Windy city” after finding a star attraction for the local saloon. As she is taken by the “Deadwood Stage” to the “Black hills of Dakota”, she meets Wild Bill Hickock, her “Secret love”.
